function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mismanagement of deceased individuals leading to tension and resistance among local populations","Impact":"Increased reluctance to report cases and increased trauma for individuals and communities","Mitigation":"Consulting with local communities to develop respectful and timely management plans for deceased individuals","Technologies":"Body handling and preservation technologies","People":"Local populations","Owner":"Local community leaders and external agencies"},{"Description":"Fatigue and wariness in local populations due to lack of engagement by external agencies","Impact":"Damaged relationships, demobilization of local community structures, and decreased resilience","Mitigation":"Provide local groups with a sense of control and necessary resources, and fulfill promises made by government and humanitarian actors","Technologies":"Community engagement and empowerment technologies","People":"Local groups, government, humanitarian actors","Owner":"Government and humanitarian agencies"}]}
